item.title: Tailscale Support for OpenBSD
item.description: Tailscale A service called Tailscale launched at the beginning of the month and promises to be the “easiest, most secure way to use WireGuard and 2FA”. As an early beta tester of WireGuard and someone who has been carefully tracking its progress towards mainline Linux (currently in net-next, scheduled for 5.6!), I am especially excited to see people much smarter than me start to build next generation VPN businesses centred around it.
